arts.ttl: Clinical Bayer Leverkusen heap more home misery on Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen secured an impressive 3-1 away win at Wolfsburg to move up to provisional second place in the standings as first-half goals from Jonas Hofmann, Edmond Tapsoba and Malik Tillman left the Wolves licking their wounds on home soil once more. Edmond Tapsoba celebrates after scoring Leverkusen's second goal, capping a commanding defensive display that earned him Player of the Match honours - IMAGO/BEAUTIFUL SPORTS/Tonh√§user
